statements: SELECT post_content, sentiment_score FROM SocialMediaSentimentAnalysis;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaSentimentAnalysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM SocialMediaSentimentAnalysis ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(sentiment_score) AS highest_sentiment FROM SocialMediaSentimentAnalysis;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM SocialMediaSentimentAnalysis WHERE stock_ticker = 'AAPL';
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaSentimentAnalysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT post_content, sentiment_score FROM SocialMediaSentimentAnalysis WHERE stock_ticker = 'AAPL' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT stock_ticker FROM SocialMediaSentimentAnalysis WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, post_content, post_date FROM SocialMediaSentimentAnalysis WHERE sentiment_score < 0.2 AND stock_ticker IN ('GOOGL', 'MSFT') ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_score, COUNT(id) AS total_posts FROM SocialMediaSentimentAnalysis WHERE post_date > '2022-06-15';
SELECT * FROM social_media_data;
SELECT id, username, sentiment_score FROM social_media_data WHERE sentiment_score > 5;
SELECT text, username FROM social_media_data ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT stock_name, movement, timestamp FROM stock_price_movements WHERE movement = 'up' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, username, text, sentiment_score FROM social_media_data WHERE username = 'user123';
SELECT * FROM social_media_data WHERE id = 1
SELECT username, text FROM social_media_data WHERE sentiment_score > 50 ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT * FROM social_media_data WHERE sentiment_score BETWEEN 0 AND 20 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM stock_price_movements WHERE timestamp <= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day'
SELECT stock_name, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM stock_price_movements GROUP BY stock_name
SELECT * FROM social_media_data;
SELECT post_text FROM social_media_data WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_text FROM social_media_data WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT sentiment_score, sentiment_date FROM sentiment_analysis ORDER BY sentiment_date ASC;
SELECT movement_id, price_movement FROM stock_price_movements WHERE movement_date < '2022-05-01';
SELECT post_id, post_text FROM social_media_data WHERE post_id = 10;
SELECT sentiment_score, sentiment_date FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT movement_id, price_movement FROM stock_price_movements WHERE movement_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT post_text, sentiment_score FROM social_media_data JOIN sentiment_analysis ON social_media_data.post_id = sentiment_analysis.post_id;
SELECT * FROM social_media_data ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM social_media_accounts;
SELECT account_id, username FROM social_media_accounts ORDER BY follower_count DESC;
SELECT tweet_text, created_at FROM tweets WHERE account_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM stock_data WHERE trade_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY stock_price DESC;
SELECT tweet_text, sentiment_score FROM tweets JOIN sentiment_analysis ON tweets.tweet_id = sentiment_analysis.tweet_id WHERE sentiment_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM social_media_accounts ORDER BY join_date DESC, follower_count DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT account_id, username, follower_count FROM social_media_accounts WHERE follower_count > 10000
SELECT tweet_text, created_at FROM tweets WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT account_id, count(tweet_id) as tweet_count FROM tweets GROUP BY account_id HAVING tweet_count > 5
SELECT sa.analysis_id, t.tweet_text, sa.sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis sa INNER JOIN tweets t ON sa.tweet_id = t.tweet_id
SELECT * FROM social_media_users;
SELECT username, followers_count FROM social_media_users WHERE followers_count > 1000;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM social_media_posts WHERE sentiment_score > 0.75 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, price FROM stock_prices WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT sentiment_category, confidence_level FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE analysis_date = '2022-02-10' ORDER BY confidence_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_users WHERE followers_count > 100 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT post_content, sentiment_score FROM social_media_posts WHERE post_date >= '2021-01-01' AND sentiment_score > 0.7;
SELECT stock_symbol, price FROM stock_prices WHERE volume > 100000 ORDER BY price DESC, date ASC;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_category = 'Positive' AND confidence_level >= 0.8 ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT prediction_date, predicted_price, actual_price FROM price_predictions WHERE stock_id = 101 ORDER BY prediction_date ASC;
